articles.description: Mr. Roux and his brother, Michel, opened Le Gavroche in the late 1960s, raising the level of fine dining in the city and offering a training ground for some of the restaurant industry’s future stars.
articles.content:
Mr. Roux and his son had recently opened two restaurants in Scotland, where Mr. Roux liked to go fishing.

articles.author: Jack Guy, CNN Business
articles.title: Neil Young has sold a big stake in his 1,180 songs - CNN
articles.description: Folk-rock superstar Neil Young has sold a 50% stake in his song catalog to investment company Hipgnosis for an estimated $150 million.
